content:
That screen from yahoo is for oauth2.

Do you have a VPN or webserver running on your computer? Cookies or javascript disabled?
creator: wsmwk

content: Go back to the setup screen. Oauth2 is an authentication option that you should see on screen
creator: davidsk

content: Is the account setup? If so, click 'account settings' and then click the 'server settings' pane and there should be an authentication setting. If the account is not setup, then click new account>email and enter name and email address and press enter. then press the manual setup link and see if you can set authentication there to OAUTH2.
creator: davidsk

content:
Let's start over.

  1. Yahoo requires a different password when using an email client and requires OAUTH2 authentication. This URL may assist:

https://help.yahoo.com/kb/SLN15241.html this gives you a password expressly for thunderbird

  1. click new account>email
  2. enter name and email account. do NOT enter password
  3. press enter key and I think the yahoo screen will pop up
  4. if a problem, submit a screenshot
creator: davidsk

content: OK thanks. i generated an app password but still the above windows appears!

content: I will look to see if I can locate someone else who may have more insight here.
creator: davidsk

content: Can you post a screenshot of incoming server settings pane and the outgoing server settings pane? seeing exactly what thunderbird sees may help
creator: davidsk

content: If the authentication is OAUTH2, try entering the normal password. If authentication is 'normal password', try the app password.
creator: davidsk

content: I have no further suggestions. Maybe someone else will reply.
creator: davidsk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
